mean_en: (not used in the progressive tenses) to be the parts that together form something; to form a group legally or officially; (not used in the progressive tenses) to be considered to be something
sentence_trans: 面包、牛肉、芝士和沙拉组成了一个完美的汉堡。
word_etyma: con共同 + stitute\u003dset up放 → 放到一起 → constitute构成，组成
